Posts.Content: I too recently had a lumpectomy in 2004...i did chemo and radiation.....in 2005 i had a lump growing at the site of my incision////i had a cat scan which showed a mass...the surgeon took off the lump..i did no radiation or chemo at this point...and this year the lump has grown back...i did a cat scan which showed a mass...if your doctor won't recommmend a cat scan find one who will
Posts.Title: CT Scans - Necessary or Not
